extracted_playbook.title: Identify Installed Version of Cortex XSOAR CommonScripts
extracted_playbook.description: Check the installed version of Cortex XSOAR CommonScripts to determine if it is prior to 1.12.33.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the installed version prior to 1.12.33?

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Patch for Cortex XSOAR CommonScripts
extracted_playbook.description: Update Cortex XSOAR CommonScripts to version 1.12.33 or later to mitigate the vulnerability.

cve_id: Palo Alto Networks Cortex XSOAR CommonScripts Vulnerability
affected_products: Palo Alto Networks Cortex XSOAR CommonScripts prior to 1.12.33
